1.prompt: Extract the business name or brand name from the website's header or meta tags.

2.prompt: Retrieve a brief description or tagline of the business from the homepage or about us page.

3.prompt: Extract the contact information (e.g., email, phone number, address) from the footer or contact us page.

4.prompt: Identify and list all social media links (e.g., Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, etc.) from the website.

5.prompt: Extract the main products or services offered by the competitor from the homepage or product/service pages.

6.prompt: Identify the competitor’s logo from the homepage or header section of the website.

7.prompt: Retrieve the language of the website (e.g., English, Spanish, etc.) from the meta tags or header section.

8.prompt: Extract the physical location or headquarters information from the about us or contact us page.

9.prompt: Look for pricing details or pricing pages related to the competitor's products/services.

10.prompt: Extract any customer reviews or testimonials from the competitor's website.

11.prompt: Identify if the competitor has a blog or resource section and extract any notable articles or resources.

12.prompt: Identify the technology stack used by the competitor, such as CMS (WordPress, Shopify), hosting, e-commerce platform, etc.

13.prompt: Extract any certifications, awards, or partnerships listed on the website (e.g., industry certifications, partner logos).

14.prompt: Extract any prominent Call to Action buttons or links (e.g., ‘Buy Now’, ‘Request a Quote’) on the homepage or product pages.

15.prompt: Locate and extract the URLs for the competitor’s terms and conditions, privacy policy, or legal disclaimers.

16.prompt: If the competitor has a blog or news section, extract a list of recent blog post titles and their links.

17.prompt: Extract keywords from the meta tags, headings, and other SEO elements (e.g., <meta name="keywords>") used by the competitor.

18.prompt: Extract any indication of the competitor's target market or customer demographics (e.g., small businesses, enterprises, individuals).

19.prompt: Look for any geographical or regional targeting information (e.g., countries, cities) mentioned on the website.

20.prompt: Check if the competitor has an affiliate or referral program and extract relevant details.

21.prompt: If the competitor offers educational resources or guides, extract the titles and links to these resources.

22.prompt: Extract questions and answers from the competitor’s FAQ page, if available.

23.prompt: Extract detailed customer testimonials or case studies from the website, including any performance metrics.

24.prompt: Look for and extract any awards or recognitions the competitor has received.

25.prompt: Extract information about the competitor's email newsletter signup form (e.g., location, benefits, call-to-action).

26.prompt: Identify and extract any press mentions or media coverage of the competitor.

27.prompt: Identify if there are any affiliate or partner links on the website and extract the related URLs.

28.prompt: Check if the competitor’s website is mobile-optimized and identify any special mobile features (e.g., AMP pages, mobile CTA buttons).

29.prompt: Check if the competitor's website has a search feature and what types of results it provides.

30.prompt: Extract product reviews and ratings, if available, for the competitor's products or services.

Pages_To_Extract.1: Home Page: General overview and links to important sections.
Pages_To_Extract.2: About Us Page: Brand story, mission, and location.
Pages_To_Extract.3: Products/Services Pages: Detailed information on offerings.
Pages_To_Extract.4: Contact Us Page: Contact info, location, and social links.
Pages_To_Extract.5: Blog/Resources Page: Educational content and thought leadership.
Pages_To_Extract.6: Testimonials/Reviews Page: Customer feedback and case studies.
Pages_To_Extract.7: Pricing Page: Pricing structure, plans, and options.
Pages_To_Extract.8: Legal Pages (Privacy Policy, Terms of Service): Legal disclaimers and policies.
Pages_To_Extract.9: FAQ Page: Frequently asked questions and answers.
Pages_To_Extract.10: Press or Media Coverage: Mentions of the competitor in the media.
